Fighters.Name: Yennefer
Fighters.Text:
At the beginning of the game, choose Yennefer or Triss to be your hero.

Sorceress of Vengerberg
IMMEDIATELY: If Yennefer is attacking, you may BOOST her attack. (This effect cannot be canceled.)

Merigold the Fearless
After Triss plays a scheme, deal 2 damage to a fighter adjacent to Triss.

Fighters.Name: Triss
Fighters.Text:
At the beginning of the game, choose Yennefer or Triss to be your hero.

Sorceress of Vengerberg
IMMEDIATELY: If Yennefer is attacking, you may BOOST her attack. (This effect cannot be canceled.)

Merigold the Fearless
After Triss plays a scheme, deal 2 damage to a fighter adjacent to Triss.

Card.Name: Incinerate
Card.Text:
This card's effects cannot be canceled.
During combat: Your opponent may discard 2 cards to ignore this card's value.

Card.Name: Merigold's Hailstorm
Card.Text: After combat: Your opponent chooses one: - they discard 2 cards - deal 3 damage to their hero - they discard the top 4 cards of their deck

Card.Name: Portal To Anywhere
Card.Text: After combat: Place a fighter in the combat in any space. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Echoing Blast
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, return this card to your hand.

Card.Name: Ball Lightning
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, your opponent discards 1 card. Otherwise, both players discard 1 card.

Card.Name: Telepathy
Card.Text: Immediately: Your opponent may discard 1 card. If they don't cancel all effects on their card.

Card.Name: Quick And Ready
Card.Text: After combat: Place your fighter in any space in their zone. Draw 1 card.

Card.Name: Paralyzing Fetters
Card.Text: Immediately: The value of your opponent's card is equal to its printed value and cannot be changed.

Card.Name: Advisor To The King
Card.Text: Each of your fighters recovers 1 health. Draw 1 card. [ONGOING]: Your BOOST values are +1. Discard this card at the end of your turn if you didn't attack.

Card.Name: Lodge Of Sorceresses
Card.Text: Each player simultaneously reveals a card from their hand and draws card equal to their card's BOOST value. Then, the player(s) who drew the most cards deals that much damage to their hero.
